about_the_game:
Toys come to life to engage in epic battles!

A unique 2D fighting game, skillfully blending elements of "Smash Bros" and "Mario Odyssey". Skillfully transfer the soul of your characters and gain advantage by creating the best possible synergies.

The heart of the game lies in its "body transmission" system. Combine this with its variety of characters with diverse personalities and skills, and deep strategic depth and endless possibilities are offered for epic battles.

With its aesthetic charm, "Toys Cracker" is the perfect game for players of all ages. Dive into this wonderful world and get ready to experience unforgettable battles, where imagination becomes reality!
